CustomField.description: This designates what program the customer's product is a part of. It gets its value from the product record relates to this lead. An example would be Perch's Solar Loan took part in the Massachusetts Solar Loan Program so the program would be MSLP.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This designates what program the customer's product is a part of. It gets its value from the product record relates to this lead. An example would be Perch's Solar Loan took part in the Massachusetts Solar Loan Program so the program would be MSLP.
CustomField.label: Product Program
